Text: help center general guideline and policy our use of cooky and similar technology our use of cooky and similar technology our service use cooky and other similar technology such a pixel or local storage to help provide you with better faster and safer experience

here are some of the way that our service including our various website sm apis email notification application button widget and ad use these technology to log you into twitter and periscope save your preference personalize the content you see protect against spam and abuse and show you more relevant ad
below we explain how twitter our partner and other third party use these technology your privacy setting and the other option you have
what are cooky pixel and local storage cooky are small file that website place on your computer a you browse the web
like many website twitter periscope and our other service use cooky to discover how people are using our service and to make them work better
pixel is small amount of code on web page or in an email notification
a many service do we use pixel to learn whether you ve interacted with certain web or email content
this help u measure and improve our service and personalize your experience
local storage is an industry standard technology that allows website or application to store information locally on your computer or mobile device
we use local storage to customize what we show you based on your past interaction with our service
why do our service use these technology our service use these technology to deliver measure and improve our service in various way
these us generally fall into one of the following category authentication and security to log you into twitter and periscope
to protect your security
to let you to view content with limited distribution
to help u detect and fight spam abuse and other activity that violate the twitter rule and the periscope community guideline
for example these technology help authenticate your access to twitter and periscope and prevent unauthorized party from accessing your account
they also let u show you appropriate content through our service
preference to remember information about your browser and your preference
for example cooky help u remember your preferred language or the country that you are in
we can then provide you with twitter and periscope content in your preferred language without having to ask you each time you visit twitter or periscope
on twitter we can also customize content based on your country such a showing you what topic are trending near you or to withhold certain content based on applicable local law
learn more about trend and country withheld content
analytics and research to help u improve and understand how people use our service including twitter button and widget and twitter ad
for example cooky help u test different version of our service to see which particular feature or content user prefer
we might also optimize and improve your experience on twitter and periscope by using cooky to see how you interact with our service such a when and how often you use them and what link you click on
we may use google analytics to assist u with this
learn more about the cooky you may encounter through our use of google analytics
we might also use cooky to count the number of user that have seen particular embedded tweet or timeline
learn more about the analytics cooky used by twitter for website widget
personalized content to customize our service with more relevant content like tailored trend story ad and suggestion for people to follow
for example local storage tell u which part of your twitter timeline or periscope global feed you have viewed already so that we can show you the appropriate new content
cooky can help u make smarter and more relevant suggestion about who you might enjoy following based on your visit to website that have integrated twitter embeds including embedded timeline
advertising to help u deliver ad measure their performance and make them more relevant to you based on criterion like your activity on twitter and visit to our ad partner website
for example we use cooky and pixel to personalize ad and measure their performance
using these technology we can show you ad and evaluate their effectiveness based on your visit to our ad partner website
this help advertiser provide high quality ad and content that might be more interesting to you
we also work with third party advertising partner including google to market our service and serve ad on behalf of our advertiser including through the delivery of interest based ad
personalization across device by better understanding how device are related we can use information from one device to help personalize the twitter experience on another device
when you log in to twitter on device we associate that device with your twitter account
whether or not you are logged in to twitter we may also receive information about your device when for example that information is shared by partner
you visit twitter
you visit third party website that integrate twitter content
or you visit twitter advertiser website or mobile application

we may use this information most commonly ip address and the time at which the information wa received to infer that certain device are associated with one another including the device on which you log in to twitter
to learn more about the device associated with your account check out your twitter data while logged in
to learn more about the other device associated with the device or browser you are currently using visit your twitter data while logged out

where are these technology used we along with third party use these technology on our website application and service and on other website application and service that have integrated our service including third party property that incorporate our advertising technology
this includes our ad partner website and site that use our embeds including embedded timeline

third party may also use these technology for example when you click on link from our website or application view or interact with third party content from within our service or visit third party website that incorporate our advertising technology
what are my privacy option we are committed to offering you meaningful privacy choice

you have number of option to control or limit how we our partner and other third party use cooky to control whether twitter store information about other website where you ve seen twitter content adjust the track where you see twitter content across the web setting in your personalization and data setting
if you have this setting turned off or are in the european union or efta state twitter will not store or use such web page visit to improve your experience in the future
if we ve previously stored your web browsing history your experience may continue to be personalized based on information already inferred from that history

if you do not want twitter to show you interest based ad on and off of twitter there are several way to disable this feature using your twitter setting visit the personalization and data setting and adjust the setting personalize ad
if you are on the web you can visit the digital advertising alliance consumer choice tool at optout
aboutads
info to opt out of seeing interest based advertising from twitter in your current browser

on io version 13 and earlier only if you do not want twitter to show you interest based ad in twitter for io on your current mobile device enable the limit ad tracking setting in your io phone setting precise direction may be different on different io version

on android if you do not want twitter to show you interest based ad in twitter for android on your current mobile device enable opt out of ad personalization in your android phone setting precise direction and name of the setting may be different on different android version and oem android variant

on io version 14 and later only if you do not want twitter to access your io identifier for advertising disable the allow apps to request to track setting in your io setting precise direction may be different on different io version
to control personalization across device on twitter visit your personalization and data setting and adjust the personalize across all your device setting

this will control whether we link your account to browser or device other than the one you use to log into twitter or if you re logged out whether we link the browser or device you re currently using to any other browser or device
to control interest based advertising from certain third party advertising partner you can learn more about opting out of receiving interest based ad at optout
aboutads
info and www
networkadvertising
org choice
if you are on the web you can also opt out of google analytics by installing google opt out browser add on and opt out of interest based google ad using google ad setting
to control cooky you can modify your setting in most web browser to accept or deny cooky or to request your permission each time site attempt to set cookie
although cooky are not required for some part of our service twitter and periscope may not work properly if you disablecookies entirely
for example you cannot log into twitter
com or pscp
tv if you ve turned off all cookie use
note please confirm that you are logged in if you want to view or change the web setting for your twitter account
changing your twitter setting in your web browser when you are logged out will only affect behavior on that browser while you are not logged in to twitter
learn more about how to access your personalization and data setting including in your twitter mobile app
